author: pgollucci
msg: for some reason glue/perl/pm_to_blib magically started
getting picked up during gmake release and then
prevent the pm_to_blib Makefile target from running
and causing glue/perl/t/*.t to fail because the
Apache2/*.pm didn't get copied to the blib directory
as make though it was already done.
That only wasted about 2 days time.
